title: Live: New Jersey picks nominees for governor on election day
shortDescription: Trump has jumped into the Garden State race, one of two gubernatorial elections this year that could serve as a pre-midterms referendum.

title: Trump: Protesters on Army's birthday will be met with 'heavy force'
shortDescription: Nationwide "No Kings" protests against Trump are scheduled for June 14 but not in D.C., the site of a 250th birthday celebration for the U.S. Army.

title: Trump warns protesters ahead of military parade
shortDescription: President Donald Trump warned people against protesting in Washington, D.C., to celebrate the U.S. Army's 250th anniversary.

title: Trump on invoking Insurrection Act
shortDescription: President Donald Trump considered invoking the Insurrection Act amid troop deployment to L.A. following ICE raid protests.

title: 'We'll see': Trump weighs invoking Insurrection Act for LA protests
shortDescription: Trump deployed National Guard troops and Marines to L.A. in response to protests. The Insurrection Act would allow him to use troops more broadly.

title: Newsom should be 'tarred and feathered,' Mike Johnson says
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson said California Gov. Gavin Newsom is keeping the Trump administration from implementing federal immigration law

title: Press groups warn DHS over First Amendment violations during LA protests
shortDescription: The California-based First Amendment Coalition, the Freedom of the Press Foundation and the LA Press Club sent a letter to DHS Secretary Kristi Noem.

title: Trump military parade is on his birthday. Last one was under Bush Sr.
shortDescription: Trump has ordered a military parade in DC for Army's 250th anniversary, which also falls on his 79th birthday. Which other world leaders have them?

title: Trump administration deploys Marines to Los Angeles | The Excerpt
shortDescription: California has sued the Trump administration to block deployment of the National Guard and the Marines. Hear these and more stories on The Excerpt.

title: RFK Jr. expels entire CDC vaccine advisory committee
shortDescription: Health Secretary Robert Kennedy Jr. removed a 17-member panel at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention that issues recommendations on vaccines.
